tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SupplyChainPayments (
  contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  party_a VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  party_b VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending',
  payment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    party_1 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    party_2 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Active'
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    party1_id UUID NOT NULL,
    party2_id UUID NOT NULL,
    payment_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    payment_status TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    payment_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    payment_status TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE contracts_history (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID NOT NULL,
    history_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    history_action TEXT NOT NULL,
    history_description TEXT
);
